CustomField.formula:
If ( AND (Is_Created_in_bid_portal__c = True, New_Template__c = False, OR ( AND (LEFT(Stage_ID__c, 1) = "1", ISBLANK(Bid_Number_1__c)), AND (LEFT(Stage_ID__c, 1) = "2", ISBLANK(Bid_Number_2a__c)), AND (LEFT(Stage_ID__c, 1) = "3", ISBLANK(Bid_Number_3a__c)), AND (LEFT(Stage_ID__c, 1) = "4", ISBLANK(Bid_Number_4a__c)))),
TRUE, FALSE)
CustomField.label: Bid Transit
